sentences.sentence: Authorities in the Philippines say a tropical storm killed fewer people than first reported, but that at least 60 people are still missing.

sentences.sentence: Officials in Somalia say scores of people are dead and injured after two car bombs rocked the center of the capital Mogadishu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia says its device of partial mobilization is complete, with more than 80,000 troops already on the front lines in Ukraine and 218,000 in training.

sentences.sentence: The nation's defense minister says no additional tasks are planned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As part of the special military operation, draft centers will continue their work of staffing the army exclusively with volunteers and candidates. On the southwestern front, civilians are continuing to be moved from Kherson to Russian-controlled territories. The battle for control of the city is imminent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Russia is making the Kherson region a zone without civilization, without elementary things that are available in most countries, Ukraine's president says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Before the arrival of Russia, this region, like all others in Ukraine, was completely normal and safe, with social services for people guaranteed there, life was guaranteed there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And now Russia is trying to make the Kherson Oblast literally an exclusion zone. Russian attacks have left four million Ukrainians without electricity. Authorities are rushing to repair damaged stations and restore supplies as temperatures drop. Kyiv claims that at least six people have been killed in shelling near the Russian-controlled area of Zaporizhia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Moscow says it has repelled Ukrainian attacks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Away from the main front line near Belarus' border, Kiev's troops are not letting their guard down as Minsk becomes increasingly determined to be involved in Russia's war.

At least 42 people were swept away by rampaging flood waters and were drowned or hit by debris-filled mudslides in three towns in the southern Manguindanao province on Thursday and Friday, according to a regional interior minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Haiti has called on the UN dissent peacekeeping troops to the island as it grapples with gang induced violence and a deepening humanitarian crisis. It comes as looters ransacked a supermarket in the capital on Saturday and seized a fuel terminal in September, forcing many petrol stations to shut down. More than 96,000 people have fled their homes in Port-au-Prince as locals compete over dwindling supplies of fuel, water and basic goods.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: You declare yourself as being the father of the poor, but in 2020, to support the poor when they were obliged to stay at home, we gave emergency aid of 600 reais.

Polls suggest Lula is a slight favorite to come back for a third term, capping a remarkable political return after his jailing on corruption convictions were overturned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: passenger train to mark 175 years of rail lines in the Alpine country. The 1.9-kilometre-long engineering feat is composed of 25 smaller trains and journeys along the scenic Albou La Bernina route through a series of 48 bridges, 22 tunnels and the world-famous Lanbazer Viaduct.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Starting in Preda, some 50 kilometres from Italy's border, the journey covered some six kilometres of track before reaching its destination, destination Bergen an hour or so later.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: is being honoured at the Philharmonie de Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He left his mark on the history of music by creating a new musical movement at the end of the 1960s, Afrobeat, which combined jazz and Yoruba music.

sentences.sentence: The exhibition traces the musical and political career of Fela Kuti, nicknamed the Black President.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Following the mashed potato incident on the 23rd of October at the museum Barberini in which Claude Monet's painting, Grain Stacks, was splattered, the Potsdam Museum in Germany reopens to the public this Sunday for an exhibition devoted to the links between magic and surrealism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The renewed interest in surrealism is explained by the ubiquity of the supernatural, the strange and the fantastic in contemporary culture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On the 18th of October, the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao celebrated its 25th anniversary. The museum was designed by one of the greatest contemporary architects, Frank Gehry. Its opening in 1997 revitalized a city and a region, giving the Basque Country a museum of international dimension, where visitors flock from all over the world. For this event, three exhibitions are devoted to the museum's collections, rich in thousands of treasures, to be discovered until January 2023.
